data.message: hi Facebook! I would like to give you one gold suggestion. Sometimes when we read some articles or links but we somehow didnt manage to save or share, but we remember that we read only half way through and would like to continue reading but we cant find it after all the endless scrolling and searching. it would be great if we had something called 'Recently Viewed/Read' or whatever u wanna call it so we can look back at what we were looking at instead of searching for it in nf or pages

replies.message: Hi Vin. We appreciate feedback from the Facebook community and use it to help inform our decisions. Thanks for sharing with us! If you have more ideas you'd like to share with us, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2crhDcr. -Jessica
